Name: Register Customer
Brief Description: Register a new customer account with the system.
Precondition: Customer must be able to access the web order system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Customer clicks button or link to "Register"
Basic flow: Customer first clicks on the button or link to initiate registration process.
System prompts the customer to fill out his/her first name, last name, billing address, shipping address, email address, and their password.
Customer enters fields.
System validates the customer's information.
System creates a new account for the Customer.
System creates a session cookie.
System displays an account home page to Customer.
Postcondition: The Customer registers and creates a new customer account with the system.

Name: Login Customer
Brief Description: Login to a customer account with the system.
Precondition: Customer account must already be registered.
Trigger: Customer clicks button or link to "Login"
Basic flow: Customer clicks on the button or link to initiate the login process.
System prompts the customer for his/her email and password.
System verifies the information.
System creates session cookie.
System displays account home page to the Customer
Alt. Flow: System prompts the Customer to resend login details to the email account.
System sends an email to the registered email address.
Postcondition: The Customer is logged into the system.

Name: Edit Customer Details
Brief Description: Edit the customer account details.
Precondition: Customer must be logged-in on the system.
Trigger: Customer clicks on the button or link to "Edit Account"
Basic flow: Customer clicks the button or link to initiate the process to edit the account.
System displays the account home page to the Customer.
Customer clicks the button or link in order to edit the account details.
System verifies the changes.
System stores new account information.
Postcondition: The Customer has changed the account details.

Name: Logout Customer
Brief Description: Logout the customer account on the system.
Precondition: Customer must be logged-in on the system.
Trigger: Customer clicks on the button or link to "Logout"
Basic flow: Customer clicks the button or link in order to initiate logout process.
System terminates the session cookie.
System displays the home page.
Postcondition: The Customer is logged out of the system.

Name: Add Item To Cart
Brief Description: Customer adds item(s) in the cart
Precondition: The customer must be logged-in on the system.
Trigger: Customer clicks the button or link to "Add To Cart".
Basic flow: Customer clicks the button or link in order to add to the cart with specified quantity.
System adds the item(s) to the cart.
System prompts the Customer to edit the quantity or remove the item from cart.
Customer confirms the items in the cart.
System stores cookie with cart details.
Customer returns to product listings.
Alt. Flow: Customer terminates the web browser window after adding item(s) to cart.
System recognizes cookie and goes to step 6 (Basic Scenario) with existing items in cart.
Postcondition: The Customer has added item(s) to the shopping cart.

Name: Checkout An Order
Brief Description: Customer places and confirms an order for the checkout process.
Precondition: Customer must be logged-in on the system.
Customer must have item(s) in the shopping cart.
Trigger: Customer clicks button or link to "Ckeckout"
Basic flow: Customer clicks the button or link to initiate the checkout process.
System calculates order of items in the shopping cart.
System appends cookie with flag for checkout process.
System presents the customer with the account details and payment methods.
Customer confirms account details and payment methods.
Customer confirms order.
System stores order confirmation and order details.
System sends email confirmation to the Customer.
System appends cookie with flag for completed checkout process.
Alt. Flow: Customer terminates order web browser during order the checkout process.
System recognizes cookie and goes to step 4 (Basic Scenario).
Postcondition: The Customer has placed and confirmed an order.

Name: Login Administrator
Brief Description: Login to an Administrator account with the system.
Precondition: Administrator account must already be registered.
Trigger: Administrator clicks button or link to "Login"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks button or link to initiate login process.
System prompts the Administrator for email and password.
System verifies information.
System creates session cookie.
System displays account home page to Administrator
Alt. Flow: System prompts Administrator to resend login details to email account.
System sends email to registered email address.
Postcondition: The Administrator is logged into the system.

Name: Logout Administrator
Brief Description: Logout the Administrator account on the system.
Precondition: Administrator must be logged-in on the system.
Trigger: Administrator clicks button or link to "Logout"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks button or link to initiate logout process.
System terminates the session cookie.
System displays home page.
Postcondition: The Administrator is logged out of the system.

Name: Add User
Brief Description: Register a new customer, sales person, or administrator account with the system.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks button or link to "Add Users"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks the button or link to initiate Add user process.
System prompts the Administrator to fill out first name, last name, username, email address, password, and privileges of the user.
System validates new user information.
System creates a new account for the new user with desired privileges.
System displays account home page to Administrator.
Postcondition: A new customer account is created within the system.

Name: Remove User
Brief Description: Remove a user from the system.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks button or link to “Remove User"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks button or link to initiate the remove user process.
System prompts the Administrator to select a user by searching or viewing a list of users.
System displays user information.
System confirms deletion of selected user.
System displays account home page to Administrator.
Postcondition: An account has been deleted within the system.

Name: Change User Properties
Brief Description: Alter properties such as passwords and privileges of the user.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks button or link to “Change User Properties"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks the button or link to initiate change user properties process.
System prompts the Administrator to select a user by searching or viewing a list of users.
System displays the user information.
System alters the user properties.
System displays the account home page to Administrator.
Postcondition: An account has been altered within the system.

Name: Install Plug-ins
Brief Description: Install a new plug-in to the application.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks the button or link to "Install Plug-ins "
Basic flow: Administrator clicks the button or link to initiate Plug-in installation process.
System prompts the Administrator to upload the Plug-in module.
System installs plug-in and validates changes.
System displays plug-in options to the Administrator.
Postcondition: A new plug-in is installed in the application.

Name: Remove Plug-ins
Brief Description: Remove a plug-in from the application.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks the button or link to "Install Plug-ins"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks the button or link to initiate Plug-in deletion process.
System prompts the Administrator to select the desired Plug-in module.
System removes the plug-in and validates changes.
Postcondition: A plug-in is removed from the application.

Name: Manage Plug-in Options
Brief Description: Make changes to an installed plug-in.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks button or link to "Manage Plug-ins"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks the button or link to initiate Plug-in Options process.
System prompts the Administrator to select the desired Plug-in module.
System displays all plug-in options to the Administrator.
System confirms changes with the Administrator.
Postcondition: A plug-in’s options have successfully been changed.

Name: Install patch process
Brief Description: Install patches or software updates to the web store.
Precondition: Administrator must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Administrator clicks the button or link to "Install Patch"
Basic flow: Administrator clicks the button or link to initiate Patching process.
System prompts the Administrator to upload the patch.
System automatically installs patches and reinitializes software.
System confirms that patch has been successfully installed.
Postcondition: The web store was successfully updated.

Name: Login Sales Person
Brief Description: Login to an account with the system.
Precondition: Sales Person account must already be registered.
Trigger: Sales Person clicks button or link to "Login"
Basic flow: Sales Person clicks the button or link to initiate login process.
System prompts the Sales Person for email and password.
System verifies the information.
System creates session cookie.
System displays the account home page to Sales Person
Alt. Flow: Sales Person enters incorrect login information.
System prompts the Sales Person to resend login details to email account.
System sends email to registered email address.
Postcondition: The Sales Person is logged into the system.

Name: Logout Sales Person
Brief Description: Logout the Sales Person account on the system.
Precondition: Sales Person must be logged-in on the system.
Trigger: Sales Person clicks the button or link to "Logout"
Basic flow: Sales Person clicks the button or link to initiate logout process.
System terminates the session cookie.
System displays home page.
Postcondition: The Sales Person is logged out of the system.

Name: Add Product
Brief Description: Add a product to the system.
Precondition: Sales Person must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Sales Person clicks the button or link to "Add Product"
Basic flow: Sales Person clicks the button or link to initiate Add Product process.
System prompts the Sales Person to fill out product name, product id, product description, product price, upload a product image, number of items in inventory, and availability of product.
System validates the new product information.
System creates a new product page for the new product.
System displays the newly created product page.
Postcondition: A new product is created within the system.

Name: Remove Product
Brief Description: Remove a product from the system.
Precondition: Sales Person must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Sales Person clicks the button or link to "Remove Product"
Basic flow: Sales Person clicks the button or link to initiate Remove Product process.
System prompts the Sales Person to select a product by searching or viewing a list of products.
System validates the product information.
System removes the product page and product information from the system.
System displays the newly created product page.
Postcondition: A product is deleted from the system.

Name: Update Product Attributes
Brief Description: Update Product attributes within the system.
Precondition: Sales Person must be able to access the weborder system via a web browser with HTTPS.
Trigger: Sales Person clicks the button or link to "Update Product Attributes"
Basic flow: Sales Person clicks the button or link to initiate Update Product Attributes process.
System prompts the Sales Person to select a product by searching or viewing a list of products.

System displays all of the product attributes and allows Sales Person to update the product name, product id, product description, product price, update the product image, product availability, and/or the number of items in the inventory.
System validates the product information.
System updates the product page and product information within the system.
System displays the newly updated product page.
Postcondition: The product attributes have been changed.
